dimensions: H x diam.: 2.9 x 13 cm (1 1/8 x 5 1/8 in.)
title: Fruit bowl
description: Circular dish with curved sides and slightly flaired lip; decorated with abstract enamel decal with pattern of interlocking circles in red, pale blue, yellow and green, all outlined in black. Gilded "mon" insignia over circle decoration at one side.
name: Fruit bowl
